member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.Compiler

member.summary: Compiles the given C# sources to the specified destination file.
member.returns: Returns diagnostic messages as an array of type . If the array is empty or all elements are warnings, the compilation succeeded.

An array of type string that contains the file names for each .
The output file name. This argument is required.
An array of type string, with files to reference.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError
member.summary: Represents an error or diagnostic message reported by the compiler.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError.ErrorLevel
member.summary: Specifies the severity of this diagnostic.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError.SourceColumn
member.summary: Specifies the column of the source text that caused the diagnostic (1-based), or 0 if there is no column information.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError.SourceFile
member.summary: Specifies the file name of the source text that caused the diagnostic or an empty string ("").

member.name: F:Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError.SourceLine
member.summary: Specifies the line of the source text that caused the diagnostic (1-based), or 0 if there is no line information.

member.summary: Returns a that represents the current .
member.returns: A string that represents the current .

member.summary: Specifies the severity of a compiler diagnostic.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
